<style>
  .members-section {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
  }

  .card-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
    gap: 24px;
    margin-top: 30px;
  }

  .person-card {
    background: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
    border-radius: 16px;
    padding: 24px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.04);
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .person-card:hover {
    box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    transform: translateY(-4px);
    border-color: #E6AA04;
  }

  .person-card img {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 50%;
    margin: 0 auto 16px;
    display: block;
    border: 3px solid #f3f4f6;
    transition: border-color 0.3s ease;
  }

  .person-card:hover img {
    border-color: #E6AA04;
  }

  .person-info {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .person-card h3 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #1f2937;
    line-height: 1.3;
  }

  /* Modal Styles */
  .modal {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
    backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
    animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
  }

  .modal-content {
    background-color: #fff;
    margin: 5% auto;
    padding: 0;
    border-radius: 20px;
    max-width: 600px;
    width: 90%;
    max-height: 80vh;
    overflow-y: auto;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
    animation: slideIn 0.3s ease;
  }

  .modal-header {
    padding: 32px 32px 24px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 24px;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fafafa 0%, #f3f4f6 100%);
    border-radius: 20px 20px 0 0;
  }

  .modal-header img {
    width: 120px;
    height: 120px;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 4px solid #E6AA04;
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }

  .modal-header-info h2 {
    margin: 0 0 8px 0;
    font-size: 1.75rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #1f2937;
    line-height: 1.2;
  }

  .modal-header-info .position {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    color: #E6AA04;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin: 0 0 4px 0;
  }

  .modal-header-info .institution {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: #6b7280;
    font-weight: 500;
    margin: 0;
  }

  .modal-body {
    padding: 32px;
  }

  .modal-section {
    margin-bottom: 28px;
  }

  .modal-section:last-child {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }

  .modal-section h3 {
    margin: 0 0 12px 0;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #1f2937;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #E6AA04;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
  }

  .modal-section p {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: #374151;
    line-height: 1.6;
  }

  .contact-links {
    display: flex;
    gap: 12px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .contact-link {

    font-weight: 500;

  }

  .contact-link:hover {
    background: #E6AA04;
    color: #fff;
    border-color: #E6AA04;
    transform: translateY(-1px);
  }

  .close {
    position: absolute;
    top: 20px;
    right: 24px;
    color: #6b7280;
    font-size: 32px;
    font-weight: 300;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: color 0.2s ease;

  .close:hover {

  }

  /* Animations */
  @keyframes fadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0; }
    to { opacity: 1; }
  }

  @keyframes slideIn {
    from {

      transform: translateY(-50px) scale(0.95);
    }
    to {

      transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
    }
  }

  /* Responsive Design */
  @media (max-width: 768px) {
    .card-grid {
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(240px, 1fr));
      gap: 16px;
    }

    .person-card {
      padding: 20px;

    .modal-content {
      margin: 10% auto;

    }

    .modal-header {
      flex-direction: column;

      padding: 24px;
    }

    .modal-header img {
      width: 100px;
      height: 100px;
    }

    .modal-header-info h2 {
      font-size: 1.5rem;
    }

    .modal-body {
      padding: 24px;
    }

    .contact-links {
      flex-direction: column;
    }

    .contact-link {
      justify-content: center;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 480px) {
    .card-grid {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
  }
</style>
